channel.title: Hi, I'm Mark Littlewood from Business of Software Conference
channel.description:
I run the [**Business of Software Conference in Boston**][1]. We aim to bring some of the best bootstrapped software entrepreneurs from around the world together to talk about how to build great products and build great businesses.
Most of the talks we produce are put online to view and share.
Great initiative Ian.
[1]: http://businessofsoftware.org

item.title: Hi, I'm Mark Littlewood from Business of Software Conference
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
More cowbell? Hmm, I don’t know. I never really consider how to make it better as I always have a great time. I’ll let you know if I come up with something

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Mark Littlewood from Business of Software Conference

item.title: Hi, I'm Mark Littlewood from Business of Software Conference
item.dc:creator: MarkLittlewood
item.description:
Thanks Ian. That means a lot. How can we make it better and more useful for you? What would you like to see there this year?

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Mark Littlewood from Business of Software Conference

item.title: Hi, I'm Mark Littlewood from Business of Software Conference
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Hi Mark,

Great to have you here! I’m really excited about the Business of Software conf this year. I guess this will be my 4th or so time going. It’s definitely my favorite conference. The content is always great, but for me it’s the best mix of people and certainly is in keeping with our themes here on the bootstrapped.fm.

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Mark Littlewood from Business of Software Conference
